TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Ciusinlun, title = Ciusinlun, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ciusinlun} }

S.FORM: Ciusinlun Itiniay i Taoyuan Cen no Kaohsiung ko Ciusinlun a niyaro', 55 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 137 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 133 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 4 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun 96%, Cou 1%, Paiwan 1%.

Ciosinlon Itiniay i Taoyoan Cen no Kaohsiong ko Ciosinlon a niyaro', 55 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 137 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 133 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 4 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon 96%, Coo 1%, Paiwan 1%.
